TopicTitle: A continuation of my other series of Minecraft animations, with at least 90% LESS MUD

Articles.Content:
Yes, it's that time again! Seeing as it has snowed a lot where I live (and the community around here apparently hates mud animations), I am going to restart my animation series, which culminated in the episode 10 finale of season 1, link at the bottom. However, instead of mud stuff involving Frozen characters, it is going to involve stuff more keeping to the original Frozen style. At least, that's the plan. May I present to you, the long text involving Anna-Mations Season 2.

Regarding Anna-Mations Season 2

I am going to make A.M. Season 2 (A.M. = Anna-Mations) starting in either February or March 2015. The difference? Less mud, more Frozen-themed stuff. For example, Elsa ends up re-freezing everything while sleeping, and then IDK what happens after that.

So, there's my current plan for A.M. S2 in a nutshell. Haven't really thought it through yet, but I just know that I want it to have less mud content.

Now, for that aforementioned link to A.M. S1 Finale: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=_9ZbXd1jY_c Since that was still S1, it involved mud.

Anyways, I hope you have ideas for Anna-Mations Season 2, you have plenty of time to suggest.

Thanks, Sun.
